posts.post_text: November 2, 2015 at 3:54 AM#2I'm not sure whether you want the line to call a variable group or a static group that is set at the time of the assignment. So:If you want to call a variable group:[color=#66FF00]Assign Macro[/color] 1.x.y /cmd="group $groupnumber"If you want to call a static group set at the time of assignment:[color=#66FF00]Setvar[/color] $command = "Group "[color=#66FF00]Addvar[/color] $command = $groupnumber[color=#66FF00]Assign Macro[/color] 1.x.y /cmd=$"command"
